job.title: Senior Software Engineer and Team Leader (1308)
job.description: We are looking for an experienced full-stack software engineer to join our software development team with experience designing, building and scaling microservices in a cloud environment. Youâ€™ll be working with a team of software engineers to create microservices in AWS, making thousands of Single Digits networks more user-friendly, reliable and scalable. You will follow Agile DevOps processes, build exciting new features, and deliver those features using our automated CI/CD process. Engineers in this position must either have experience with the networking industry, or be quick to learn new skills.
